attributes.action: Free, nationwide, Wi-Fi networks to be set up in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We, (TeamRock Radio) & the undersigned, believe that the UK government should start the process of creating free Internet access (nationwide) with the creation of 'super Wi-Fi' networks.

Aside from providing new opportunities for businesses, it would spur a massive boom in innovation. It would also bring connectivity to remote areas of the country which suffer from poor internet access.

Other countries in the world such as South Korea enjoy such benefits and as a innovative, forward thinking country we should strive for the same.

#FreeWifi4UK
